sources.title: Lucy Waits Up for Chris (1962)
sources.description: When Lucy waits up for her daughter Chris to return from a date, the fourteen-year old girl is mightly embarrassed. Lucy promises never to do it again, but can't help herself. To not be discovered, Lucy accidentally locks herself out of the house and has to enter by the only means available; a trampoline. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lucy-waits-up-for-chris-1962/
